-- 1. Załaduj dane z Bronze i Customers jako tymczasowe widoki
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_inventory
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/inventory_wholesaler_history_details'
);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW silver_customers
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
);

-- 2. Utwórz tabelę docelową Silver jako Delta (jeśli nie istnieje)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS default.f_wh_data (
  product_id STRING,
  country_id STRING,
  transaction_date DATE,
  whrs_sell_in_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_open_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_end_quantity DOUBLE,
  whrs_sell_in_amount DOUBLE,
  whrs_open_amount DOUBLE,
  whrs_end_amount DOUBLE,
  unit_price DOUBLE
)
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_wh_data/';

-- 3. MERGE danych do tabeli Silver z agregacją i filtrowaniem
MERGE INTO default.f_wh_data AS silver
USING (
    WITH enriched AS (
        SELECT
            inv.*,
            c.country_id,
            ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY product_id, customer_id ORDER BY update_date DESC) AS rn
        FROM bronze_inventory inv
        JOIN silver_customers c ON inv.customer_id = c.customer_id
    ),
    filtered AS (
        SELECT
            product_id,
            country_id,
            TRUNC(transaction_date, 'MM') AS transaction_date,
            unit_price,
            whrs_sell_in_quantity,
            whrs_open_quantity,
            whrs_end_quantity
        FROM enriched
        WHERE rn = 1
    ),
    aggregated AS (
        SELECT
            product_id,
            country_id,
            transaction_date,
            SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity) AS whrs_sell_in_quantity,
            SUM(whrs_open_quantity) AS whrs_open_quantity,
            SUM(whrs_end_quantity) AS whrs_end_quantity,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_sell_in_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_open_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_open_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_end_quantity * unit_price), 2) AS whrs_end_amount,
            ROUND(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(whrs_sell_in_quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
        FROM filtered
        GROUP BY product_id, country_id, transaction_date
    )
    SELECT * FROM aggregated
) AS new_data
ON silver.product_id = new_data.product_id
   AND silver.country_id = new_data.country_id
   AND silver.transaction_date = new_data.transaction_date
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    whrs_sell_in_quantity = new_data.whrs_sell_in_quantity,
    whrs_open_quantity = new_data.whrs_open_quantity,
    whrs_end_quantity = new_data.whrs_end_quantity,
    whrs_sell_in_amount = new_data.whrs_sell_in_amount,
    whrs_open_amount = new_data.whrs_open_amount,
    whrs_end_amount = new_data.whrs_end_amount,
    unit_price = new_data.unit_price
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    product_id, country_id, transaction_date,
    whrs_sell_in_quantity, whrs_open_quantity, whrs_end_quantity,
    whrs_sell_in_amount, whrs_open_amount, whrs_end_amount,
    unit_price
  )
  VALUES (
    new_data.product_id, new_data.country_id, new_data.transaction_date,
    new_data.whrs_sell_in_quantity, new_data.whrs_open_quantity, new_data.whrs_end_quantity,
    new_data.whrs_sell_in_amount, new_data.whrs_open_amount, new_data.whrs_end_amount,
    new_data.unit_price
  );
